replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
打开文件夹，压缩为 zip ，改后缀为 .mcworld 

然后双击导入

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 雪颜の顾
replies.txt_content:
直接把该文件夹放到下面这个路径，你试试可以嘛？
C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Local\Packages\Microsoft.MinecraftUWP_8wekyb3d8bbwe\LocalState\games\com.mojang\minecraftWorlds

replies.txt_content: 如果我没猜错，你套了两层文件夹，对吧？去掉一个就好
